WebTransportSendStreamSendOrder.summary: The sendOrder property of the interface indicates the send priority of this stream relative to other streams for which the value has been set.

remarks.para:
Queued bytes are sent first for streams that have a higher value.
If not set, the send order depends on the implementation.

WebTransportSendStreamSendOrder.value: A number indicating the relative priority of this stream when sending bytes.
